Title: Prominent Indian-origin virologist in South Africa dies from coronavirus - Yahoo India News
Description: Johannesburg, Apr 1 (PTI) World-renowned virologist Gita Ramjee has become the first Indian-origin South African to have died after contracting the novel coronavirus that has killed five people in the country.

Title: Coronavirus: In fresh guidelines, health ministry recommends anti-malarial drug for Covid-19 - India Today
Description: Bijnor Superintendent of Police (Rural) said the police picked up eight Indonesian Islamic preachers, who had attended the Nizamuddin 'markaz' on March 13, from a mosque in Nagina block of the district.

Title: Coronavirus linked to cardiac injury even in patients without heart conditions - Oneindia
Description: COVID-19 can cause cardiac injury even in patients without underlying heart conditions, and have fatal consequences for people with cardiovascular disease, according to a review of studies.

Title: Coronavirus: Indian government’s MyGov app has some myth-busters for you - Hindustan Times
Description: The Indian government’s MyGov app is doing its bit in fighting fake news and misinformation on coronavirus by stating some ‘myth-busters’.
